name: In Space No One Can Hear You Meow (Kilansky)
name_original: In Space No One Can Hear You Meow (Kilansky)
description:
With only a jet-pack to propel you through space and a gravity/laser gun in hand, can you collect all of the mischievous cats that have wandered from the space station? Keep an eye on your oxygen and fuel levels though, as failure to do so may leave you stranded in space. Best of luck out there cadet!

*IMPORTANT: This game was developed with/for the HTC Vive and the game may not be compatible with other VR headsets. In addition, the widget interaction component is invisible in the final build of the game (despite working fine in the editor), so you will need to navigate menus through pointing at and highlighting buttons. We hope the quality of the game makes up for the inconvenience!

This game was created in 7 days with the Unreal Engine for the Epic Games Megajam 2019. 

Credits:

Kilan Larsen - Project Lead, Programmer, UI Designer

Vanessa Villegas - 3D Modelling and Texturing

Alexandra Figueroa- 3D Modelling, Voice Recording

Joeseph Warren - 3D Modelling, Voice Recording

Trevor Torres - Skybox designer, level designer

Special Thanks to Eric Matyas for the Music!
